metadata.name: Reactions #1
metadata.description:
Reactions are moments of transformation.

plodesÂ® studio | Reactions are micro vectorized field photos that document fantastically unique patterns and colors that only appear momentarily on the surface of our steel fire pit sculptures during the patina process phase of their fabrication.

Each digital photo is algorithmically reproduced by replacing ordinary pixels with a network of vector-based polygons. We emulated polycrystal like structures such as the flaky patterns of sheet metal galvanization or the microscopic grain view of steel itself. This transformation enables Reactions to be independent of resolution or scale and encourages infinite abstract micro views and experiences by zooming and panning within each piece.

PDF vector file download: https://nfts.plodes.com/ipfs/QmaJCiXCXoBExqcxgWtpm6PLBovPyUCs7YjaGw7S6QEuXh/1.pdf

JPG hi-res file download:  
https://nfts.plodes.com/ipfs/QmVuBjMRpUSm5yGzNG6yxA8KZVhFz6QmHNahF6n3sySwxV/1.jpg
